author: rickhall
msg: Framework was refreshing bundles incorrectly by stopping a bundle then
refreshing it in one step when it should really be stopping all bundles
in one step then refreshing all bundles in a second step. (FELIX-3153)

author: hwright
msg: Without this we are writing to const memory.
